remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何啟用拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates how to enable drag-and-drop operations within a control. 在範例中，可以將任何節點拖曳至另一個節點不被拖曳節點的子系。In the example, any node can be dragged to another node that is not a descendant of the dragged node. 拖曳的節點，包括其所有子系節點，會變成目的地節點的子系。The dragged node, including all of its descendant nodes, becomes a child of the destination node. 使用滑鼠左鍵時，會將拖曳的節點移動到目的地節點。When the left mouse button is used, the dragged node is moved to the destination node. 使用滑鼠右鍵時，會將拖曳的節點複製到目的地節點。When the right mouse button is used, the dragged node is copied to the destination node.
